Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine’s Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

—Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

—8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

— 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

—Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

—Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

—Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

—IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
【Warm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control】Including (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. 【IP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS】Perfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
【4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function】Our Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
【Safety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape】UL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
【What You Get & Quality Assurance】1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don’t hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual

1 x colorful gift box

We wish you can have a colorful holidays

8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control

Christmas string lights come with 8 modes, including combination, in waves,slo-glo,chasing/fade, slow fade,twinkling/flash,sequential, in wave modes.From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

Safe to Touch & IP44 Waterproof

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.IP44 waterproof and designed to withstand bad weather.

Timer & Memory Function

Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. Built in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset everyday.

4 Brightness Levels

Press DIM+/Dim- via remote controller to adjust brightness level (100%-75%-50%-25%) to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

Multi-function Electronic Digital Sport Stopwatch Timer, Large Display with Date Time and Alarm Function,suitable for Sports Coaches Fitness Coaches and Referees
Time, Date And Alarm Function: Switch between 3 display modes to check the time, date and set your alarm. On the clock mode, hit the two outer buttons at the same time to turn off the alarm.
1/100 Second Split Timing, Measure time at an accuracy of one hundredth of a second. Use the split time feature to precisely measure multiple events.
100% Brand New and High Quality.
Light Weight and included lanyard this sports stopwatch is the ideal time measurement device for athletes – especially runners – coaches and referees.
Low price, good quality.

function isValidUrl(url) {

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;

return ”;

From the brand

Merry and Bright

Swipe left to learn more

Committed to creating a comfortable, cozy and festival ambiance for your outdoor & indoor space and life.

We are continually enhancing our product lines to bring you the newest technologies and features available in the marketplace.

We pays attention to not only colorful lighting but also your safety.

Enjoy Decorating Your Home

STRING LIGHTS

WINDOW LIGHTS

ICECICLE LIGHTS

HALLOWEEN LIGHTS

【More Comprehensive Functions】8 Lighting Modes Timer Memory8 options lighting modes make a playful addition to Christmas decor. Build in timer and memory, lights will auto on/off once set, don’t need to operate it manually. Saves your last lighting choice, which is more user friendly!
【Safer and Energy Efficient】High Efficient LED lights will save you money on energy costs, they’ll last longer than incandescent lights and you don’t have to worry about them overheating. Features upgraded 29V low voltage ETL adapter allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, max 1222 LED 132ft, so you can extend to decorate a greater area easily.
【Superior Weather Resistance】Our led lights use high-quality PVC wire and built with IP44 Weatherproof-Tech so that they can withstand all weather for year-round enjoyment. Please note that the adapter is NOT waterproof, please kindly protect the power adapter from the water!
【Popular Choice & Widely Used】Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. White Christmas lights lend a timeless look, and they will give your home a whimsical, snow-covered appearance. More safer to kids and your family while Christmas party, family reunion, wedding party and BBQ outside.



Features

  • High Brightness: Features shatter-resistant acrylic LED bulbs with a concave lens, for a brilliant burst of light that looks great even from a distance.
  • Much Safer: The working voltage for the LED string light is only 29V, which emits extremely low heat. And the circuit board of adapter with short circuit protection puts your safety first. (All passed the UL588 test.)
  • Economic: Only 6 watts per set, saving money on your energy bills while you enjoy the beauty of brilliant Christmas lights.
  • Built to Last: The LEDs are wrapped with milky white sleeve and hot melt adhesive, that seal out moisture for longer life, and a lifespan up to 50000 hours.

These fantastic ice lights perfectly complement other outdoor decorations like Christmas window lights and help to transform your garden (usually at the front) into a festive grotto, especially when teamed with decorations like Outdoor Christmas decorations.

Product Parameters

Light Color: Cool White
Wire color: Clear wire
Number of leds: 611 LED
Number of drop wire: 141 drops
Light Length: 66ft (20m)
Power lead length: 11.5ft (3.5m)

5.5-in spacing between drops, and staggered drop lengths of 23.6 in, 15.7 in and 11.8 in, provide the virtual icy look for your home.


WIDELY USED–The Christmas lights are easy to install on overhangs, awnings, roof edges, windows and other places on your home’s exterior or interior.

Dense evergreen trees, like pines, firs and spruces, may require more lights. By wrapping bushes and shrubs with this ice string lights, you’ll cover a greater area with fewer strands and less work.


Read more




UL LISTED AND QUALITY INSPECTION

Clear wire with 29V UL listed power adapter led string lights create a safe and secure holiday for you and your loved one.

WITH MEMORY FUNCTION

Built-in memory chip, Saves your last lighting mode without you having to remember to reset so every night, which is more user friendly!

END TO END CONNECTABLE

Features upgraded adapter led string lights allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, 66ft 611 LED per strand, max 1222 LED 132ft. So you can easily light a greater area.

Read more


It is suitable for decoration in many scenes, but also suitable as a gift for our family, friends, classmate, lovers and so on.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:48 UTC – Details)



Voice Control: You can control your devices hands free, just give voice commands to turn on/off the connected devices. Compatible with Apple HomeKit, Apple Watch, Siri, Carplay, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant.
Compact Size: Smart plug occupies only one socket, the device allows you to stack two mini smart plugs in the same outlet, which is convenient and practical.
Schedule: You can schedule connected home devices to turn on and off automatically by smart plugs. Save energy when lights are not needed or left on by accident. Sunrise and sunset setting are supported.
Quality: The mini plug is made of PC flame retardant material, and has been approved for safety and quality assurance. Certified by ETL and FCC, it supports home appliance up to 15A.

From the brand

Light Up Your Life

Hot Sale Icicle Lights

Popular String Lights

Classic Christmas Mini Lights

CLuster Lights Christmas Tree

Christmas Icicle Lights

【 Energy Saving & Safe to Use】These UL588-listed icicle outdoor lights come with a 29V low voltage plug, offer up to 90% in energy savings than traditional incandescent lights and ensure the max safety. This means children, and pets are safe to touch the hanging Christmas lights. More safety and less power consumption.
【8 Modes with Remote & Memory 】Our LED icicle string lights offer 8 different lighting modes for you to choose from (Steady on, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing Flash, Fade, Twinkling Flash, and Combination). And thanks to the built-in memory chip, our fairy icicle lights will save your last time lights setting.
【4 Brightness levels & 3 Timer Function】4 Brightness level: 100%-75%-50%-25%; 3 Timer Function: 6H on, 18H off/ 8H on, 16H off/ 6H on, 6H off, 3H on, 9H off. You can adjust Christmas lights for the house by remote easily, and choose one favorite mode to enhance the Christmas spirit.
【IP44 Waterproof 】The Waterproof Christmas string lights are designed to withstand light rain or water spills, making them perfect for both indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations even on rainy or snowy days, like eave, patio, stair, gazebo, fence, trees, roof awnings, or even hung on the wall of your bedroom.

Ollny Christmas Icicle Lights Decorate Your Life!

You can adjust modes/dimmable/times by remote easily. Choose one favorite mode to create your lively Christmas atmosphere. Connected led Christmas lights can be controlled by one remote. For 720LED 60FT long Icicle Lights, we recommend connecting only 2 sets to ensure the lighting effect.

Memory Function

A built-in memory chip will save your last mode settings. There is no need to reset the mode each day.

Read more

Installation

These icicle lights were neatly packed, which makes it easy to unpack them without creating a tangle. Please kindly hang the main string of lights first, then unwrap the individual strings to avoid tangling.

From the brand

Swipe left to learn more ⊳⊳⊳

About Eightree

Eightree is an up-and-coming brand established in 2021, dedicated to product development and manufacturing in the field of smart home.

Our mission is to provide more convenient, high quality but affordable smart home solutions for people around the world.

Smart home never needs to be expensive, just enjoy the convenience that smart home brings to your life. Eightree is always at your service.

Smart Plugs Alexa Compatible

Energy Monitor&Smart Lighting

APP Remote Control: Easily control your home appliances at any time and any place through Smart Life APP. No more worrying about forgetting to turn off the appliances when you are out.
Voice Control: Smart plugs that work with Alexa and Google Assitant, you can speak with Alexa and OK Google to achieve hands-free control of home electrical devices.
Easy Setup: It takes less than two minutes for the configurartion. And the upgraded chip makes it easy to keep a stable network connection and not easy to go offline.
Other Features: Diverse timer scheduling functions, Create scenes, Group control, and Device sharing functions are also configured, just choose us to start your smart home tour.
7*24 Customer Service: If you encounter any issues or need further support, please get in touch with us directly via Amazon or email us.

[Timer Function]: Comes with built-in auto timer function(6 hrs ON, 18 hrs OFF), to avoid forgetting to turn off the Christmas lights. Just turn on the lights (any lighting mode) at 6 p.m. in the evening, and it will turn off at 12 a.m. at midnight, then auto on at 6 p.m. in the evening, this cycle repeats itself ad infinitum, no need to reset it everyday
[Durable & Safe Green Wire String Lights]: Keep at a low temperature state after lighting up for hours, ensure and maximize the safety. 3 AA Batteries operated, not include batteries. No extra cord or socket required, for safe and convenient use. Battery box to the first LED light: 1ft. Total length(lights string and leading line): 17ft
[IP 44 Waterproof]: The strong construction makes the string lights tough and sturdy, and waterproof designed string lights perfect for Christmas indoor outdoor decorations. The battery case is waterproof IP44, so it can meet normal use outside but not enough to put under water directly
[Great Outdoor Decorations]: Perfect for indoor and outdoor use, like home, bar, garden, patio, balcony, or wherever decorative light is needed. Ideal for Christmas party, Halloween, Valentine’s day, wedding, Home, Window, Bathroom, Thanksgiving day, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building decorations

WATERGLIDE 50 LED Outdoor Christmas Lights, Battery Operated Mini String Lights with 8 Lighting Modes & Timer

Decorate with our 16ft Christmas decorative mini string lights with 50 warm white individual LED bulbs, will give a soft festive feel to your Xmas.

Notes:

1. Do not mix old and new batteries.

2. Do not mix different types of batteries.

3. If you do not use, please remove the batteries before storage.

Specifications:

Light Color: Warm White

LED Count: 50 pcs Each

Total Length (end to end): 17FT Each

String lights: 16FT Each

Waterproof Level: IP44

Power Supply: Battery Powered

Timer: 6 hours on and 18 hours off

Each string is full wave rectified, which eliminates any flickering making these LED Christmas lights bright.

High bright and luminous intensity, good heat dissipation, low light decay, and create romantic life for you.

8 lighting modes for you to choose – Combination, In waves, Sequential, Slow Glow, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. Comes with built-in auto timer function without setting (6 hrs ON, 18 hrs OFF), to avoid forgetting to turn off the Christmas lights.

Perfect eye-catching accent for your indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations for your garden, pathway, lawn, yard, flowerbed, fence, walkway or anywhere you want, they will create a warm Christmas feel to your space.

From the brand

BurgeonNest Pet Supplies

5 Packs Christmas Puppy Chew Toys will Bring Fun to Your Dog While Improving Dental Health

Heating Pet Pad with Adjustable Timer High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Slow feeder Stainless Steel 4-in-1 Food and Water Bowls with No-Spill Silicone Mat

Item model number ‏ : ‎ TK-HPP7040A
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HIRALIY
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08CXM511G

7 layer Protection Structure: This pet heating pad is made of soft velvet cover, watertight film, refractory wool and alloy heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure will offer your pet in gentle warming comfort
High Temperature Self-destruct Function: Heated dog pad passes certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct function. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature ,and the heated cat pad will automatically stop working for no more overheating
Against-chew Cord and Washable Velvet Cover: This heating pad for cats uses a bite-proof protective sleeve at the junction of the power cord and the steel cord is 2.1 meters which can withstand 5 KG pull.Quick-drying Soft cover can be take out easily and cleaned by hand
Comfortable and Warming: This heated pet mat can be used in pet houses and nests, also suitable for senior pets, arthritic pets, new born pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury. Help the pet (dog, cat, rabbit, etc.) to keep warm and comfortable in cold winter

BurgeonNest Heating Pad for Your Pets Provide Warmth in the Cold Winter

7 Layer Protection Structure

BurgeonNest pet heating pad is made of soft velvet, refractory wool, MET approved heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure & completely sealed, offers pet’s the most comfortable temperature range ( 86-131℉/30-55℃).

High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Our heating pads for dogs passes Certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct funtion. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature, and the dog heated pad will automatically stop working for prevent overheating.

PVC Waterproof Material

Cat bed heater with IP68 Waterproof liner protects from stains and odors etc. It is waterproof material won’t fade, and the material is hardwearing and won’t rip.

Dual Resistant Chew Cord

Cats usually sniff, lick and chew objects to explore everything, this cat warmer pad comes with a steel-wrapped cord to protect dog safety.

Soft Fleece Cover Easy to Clean

The soft velvet cover is removable, so you can machine wash it.

How to Clean: Remove the cover and wash it with hand or washing machine. Do not plug in until the heated pet pad is completely dry.

item.title: SwitchBot Smart Plug Mini 15A, Energy Monitor, Smart Home WiFi(2.4GHz) & Bluetooth Outlet Compatible with Alexa & Google Home, APP Remote Control & Timer Function, No Hub Required(4 Pack)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description SwitchBot Plug Mini to some may look a little ordinary, but there’s more to it than that. We looked to make a plug that focused more on what happens on the inside. Plug Mini includes 3 amazing chips, one for Wi-Fi functionality, one for Bluetooth connections, and a ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

SwitchBot Plug Mini to some may look a little ordinary, but there’s more to it than that. We looked to make a plug that focused more on what happens on the inside. Plug Mini includes 3 amazing chips, one for Wi-Fi functionality, one for Bluetooth connections, and a power consumption chip.

Even more reliable

No Hub required, with the choice between Bluetooth or Wi-Fi to connect. ETL listed.

Please note: you can only add Plug Mini to our app when using a 2.4Ghz Wi-fi connection. Once added, you can then use Bluetooth.

Control from anywhere

Thanks to our 3 all-new built-in performance chips, you can now control Plug Mini however you want, and whenever you want.

Monitor Energy and Save Big

You can now view your energy consumption data on the go, thanks to intuitive app graphs and breakdowns that let you see exactly where your home energy is being used.

Check up on Appliances in Seconds

You can quickly see the status of appliances and turn them on or off should you need to.

A plug you can count on

Plug Mini is built to protect, with a fire-resistant cover, overload protection and a safety-based shutter design you’ll be able to enjoy more peace of mind when charging appliances.

Keep this device dry and away from hot, humid, and/or other extreme environments.

Made to be non-intrusive

SwitchBot Plug Mini is designed to fit in anywhere discreetly and has minimal impact on your home no matter where you plug it in.

Your First Step to a Better Home Protects against overcharging

Set automated scenes to help stop smartphone device charging when your battery reaches a certain percent.

Turns on fans when Meter detects high temperature

Helps keep your environment comfortable depending on your needs.

Helps activate home appliances automatically

Automates devices so you can focus more on what matters.

Your first step to a better home

Use with SwitchBot Ecosystem and integrate Plug Mini with other SwitchBot products for an even more seamless smart home life.

Integrate Plug Mini with other appliances for an even more seamless smart home life.

Even more ways to control

You can control our products using a variety of methods.

1 SwitchBot Remote Control 2 SwitchBot NFC Tag Control 3 Apple Watch Control 4 App Control 5 Voice Control

SwitchBot Plug Mini series Connection Method Wi-Fi & Bluetooth Wi-Fi & Bluetooth Wi-Fi & Bluetooth Wi-Fi & Bluetooth Wi-Fi & Bluetooth Wi-Fi Connection 2.4 GHz only 2.4 GHz only 2.4 GHz only 2.4 GHz only 2.4 GHz only Bluetooth Range Approx. 100m/328ft Approx. 100m/328ft Approx. 100m/328ft Approx. 100m/328ft Approx. 100m/328ft Material V0 Fire-resistant PC V0 Fire-resistant PC V0 Fire-resistant PC V0 Fire-resistant PC V0 Fire-resistant PC Size 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.5 inches 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.5 inches 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.5 inches 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.5 inches 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.5 inches Control Methods Voice Control & App Control Voice Control & App Control Voice Control & App Control Voice Control & App Control Voice Control & App Control Energy Monitoring HomeKit Supported Third-Party Services Alexa/ Google Home/ IFTTT Alexa/ Google Home/ IFTTT Alexa/ Google Home/ IFTTT Alexa/ Google Home/ IFTTT Alexa/ Google Home/ IFTTT Max Output Current 1875W; 15A 1875W; 15A 1875W; 15A 1875W; 15A 1875W; 15A Voltage Input 100 – 125 V AC 50 / 60Hz 100 – 125 V AC 50 / 60Hz 100 – 125 V AC 50 / 60Hz 100 – 125 V AC 50 / 60Hz 100 – 125 V AC 50 / 60Hz Operating Temperature 5℉~104℉ 5℉~104℉ 5℉~104℉ 5℉~104℉ 5℉~104℉

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ W1901400
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 26, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Wonderlabs
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09YV2L3MN

Make Your Appliances Smart – Plug your existing appliances to this smart plug, and get ready to enjoy upgraded smart appliances. This WiFi plug allow you control your home devices remotely anytime anywhere (only supports 2.4Ghz WiFi). Enjoy the convenience of smart life!
Alexa Plug & Timer Plug – Free your hands with this smart plug when connect it with Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri Shorcuts, and Smartthings. You can also set timers to avoid energy waste for lamps, fans, or humidifiers.
Energy Consumption Monitoring – Monitor every consumption of your plug-in devices by checking the data through the app. The consumption data can also be exported in a document.
Easy to Set up & Friendly Design – Plug in, open the app, you can get started in minutes. Space-saving design fits into almost any electrical outlet without blocking other sockets.
Safe & Reliable & ETL Listed – The advanced V-0 flame retardant material and technique ensure your home safety. Overload protection feature gives you a chance of a second thought about using appliances with high wattage appliances. Please keep this device dry and away from hot, humid, and/or other extreme environments as this may cause accidents such as fire, burns, injury, electric shock and so on.

SwitchBot Plug Mini to some may look a little ordinary, but there’s more to it than that. We looked to make a plug that focused more on what happens on the inside. Plug Mini includes 3 amazing chips, one for Wi-Fi functionality, one for Bluetooth connections, and a power consumption chip.

Check up on Appliances in Seconds

A plug you can count on

Plug Mini is built to protect, with a fire-resistant cover, overload protection and a safety-based shutter design you’ll be able to enjoy more peace of mind when charging appliances.

100-hour chronograph with lap & split times; 24-hour countdown timer; month, day & date calendar
3 daily, weekday or weekend alarms with 5-minute backup; 24-hour military time mode; 2 time zones
Black 41mm resin case with acrylic lens; gray digital display; Indiglo light-up watch dial
Water-resistant to 100m (330 ft): In general, suitable for snorkeling, as well as swimming, but not diving

Expedition Digital

Get outside. Take the road less traveled or conquer the highest mountain peaks — discover the freedom to explore with the watch built for the great outdoors.
